s0082.chinese: 十一年，王翦、桓齮、楊端和攻鄴，取九城。
s0082.literal: In the eleventh year, Wang Jian, Huan He, and Yang Duanhe attacked Ye and took nine cities.
s0082.idiomatic: In the eleventh year, Wang Jian, Huan He, and Yang Duanhe attacked Ye and took nine cities.

s0083.chinese: 王翦攻閼與、橑楊，皆并為一軍。
s0083.literal: Wang Jian attacked Eyu and Laoyang, all combining into one army.
s0083.idiomatic: Wang Jian attacked Eyu and Laoyang, all combining into one army.

s0084.chinese: 翦將十八日，軍歸斗食以下，什推二人從軍取鄴安陽，桓齮將。
s0084.literal: Jian commanded for eighteen days; the army returned; from dou-rank officials downward, two out of ten followed the army to take Ye and Anyang; Huan He commanded.
s0084.idiomatic: Jian commanded for eighteen days; the army returned; from dou-rank officials downward, two out of ten followed the army to take Ye and Anyang; Huan He commanded.

s0085.chinese: 十二年，文信侯不韋死，竊葬。
s0085.literal: In the twelfth year, Marquis Wenxin Buwei died and was buried secretly.
s0085.idiomatic: In the twelfth year, Marquis Wenxin Buwei died and was buried secretly.

s0086.chinese: 其舍人臨者，晉人也逐出之；
s0086.literal: Among his retainers, those who attended the funeral and were from Jin were expelled;
s0086.idiomatic: Among his retainers, those who attended the funeral and were from Jin were expelled;

s0087.chinese: 秦人六百石以上奪爵，遷；
s0087.literal: Qin people of six hundred shi rank and above were stripped of rank and exiled;
s0087.idiomatic: Qin people of six hundred shi rank and above were stripped of rank and exiled;

s0088.chinese: 五百石以下不臨，遷，勿奪爵。
s0088.literal: those of five hundred shi and below who did not attend the funeral were exiled but not stripped of rank.
s0088.idiomatic: those of five hundred shi and below who did not attend the funeral were exiled but not stripped of rank.

s0089.chinese: 自今以來，操國事不道如嫪毐、不韋者籍其門，視此。
s0089.literal: From now on, those who handle state affairs improperly like Lao Ai and Buwei will have their households registered; observe this.
s0089.idiomatic: From now on, those who handle state affairs improperly like Lao Ai and Buwei will have their households registered; observe this.

s0090.literal: In autumn, the retainers of Lao Ai who had been exiled to Shu were pardoned.
s0090.idiomatic: In autumn, the retainers of Lao Ai who had been exiled to Shu were pardoned.

s0091.chinese: 當是之時，天下大旱，六月至八月乃雨。
s0091.literal: At that time, there was a great drought throughout the land; from the sixth to the eighth month it finally rained.
s0091.idiomatic: At that time, there was a great drought throughout the land; from the sixth to the eighth month it finally rained.

s0092.chinese: 十三年，桓齮攻趙平陽，殺趙將扈輒，斬首十萬。
s0092.literal: In the thirteenth year, Huan He attacked Pingyang of Zhao, killed Zhao general Hu Zhe, and beheaded one hundred thousand.
s0092.idiomatic: In the thirteenth year, Huan He attacked Pingyang of Zhao, killed Zhao general Hu Zhe, and beheaded one hundred thousand.

s0094.literal: In the first month, a comet appeared in the east.
s0094.idiomatic: In the first month, a comet appeared in the east.

s0095.literal: In the tenth month, Huan He attacked Zhao.
s0095.idiomatic: In the tenth month, Huan He attacked Zhao.

s0096.chinese: 十四年，攻趙軍於平陽，取宜安，破之，殺其將軍。
s0096.literal: In the fourteenth year, they attacked Zhao's army at Pingyang, took Yi'an, defeated it, and killed its general.
s0096.idiomatic: In the fourteenth year, they attacked Zhao's army at Pingyang, took Yi'an, defeated it, and killed its general.

s0097.literal: Huan He pacified Pingyang and Wucheng.
s0097.idiomatic: Huan He pacified Pingyang and Wucheng.

s0098.chinese: 韓非使秦，秦用李斯謀，留非，非死雲陽。
s0098.literal: Han Fei came as envoy to Qin; Qin used Li Si's plot, detained Fei, and Fei died at Yunyang.
s0098.idiomatic: Han Fei came as envoy to Qin; Qin used Li Si's plot, detained Fei, and Fei died at Yunyang.

s0099.literal: The King of Han requested to become a vassal.
s0099.idiomatic: The King of Han requested to become a vassal.

s0100.chinese: 十五年，大興兵，一軍至鄴，一軍至太原，取狼孟。
s0100.literal: In the fifteenth year, they greatly mobilized troops: one army reached Ye, one army reached Taiyuan, and took Langmeng.
s0100.idiomatic: In the fifteenth year, they greatly mobilized troops: one army reached Ye, one army reached Taiyuan, and took Langmeng.
